concept.title: Classification
concept.shortdesc: A Classification column heading contains the classification name.

conbody.p: For example, reports and analytics automatically include two classifications for Campaign variables: Campaigns and Creative Elements. To add data to the Campaigns classification, the column heading in the classification data file would be Campaigns.

p.note: The values in the Classifications column heading must exactly match the classification’s naming convention, or the import fails. For example, if the administrator changes Campaigns to Internal Campaign Names in the Campaign Set-up Manager, the file column heading must change to match.
